Description.Text: Facilities Guests can feel at home in one of the 68 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a newspaper stand, a business centre and a fireplace. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. Guests can buy souvenirs at the gift shop. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Rooms Rooms feature air conditioning, a living room and a bathroom. A sofabed ensures a good night's sleep. Additional features include a fridge and a tea/coffee station. Little extras, including internet access, a TV and WiFi, contribute to a great stay. The accommodation offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A pool and an outdoor pool are available to travellers. The hotel offers a gym (for a fee) to guests. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable.
